name: Memberful
description: All-in-one membership platform for creators to monetize their passion with recurring subscriptions, gated content, and membership benefits.

name: Patreon
description: Platform for creators to run a subscription service with tiered membership levels, exclusive content, and community features.

name: Substack
description: Publishing platform that combines newsletters, podcasts and community features with paid subscription models for writers.

name: Ghost
description: Independent publishing platform with built-in membership and subscription tools for professional publishers and creators.

name: Ko-fi
description: Platform for creators to receive support through one-time donations, memberships, and selling digital products with 0-5% platform fees.

name: Buy Me A Coffee
description: Simple way for creators to accept support and tips from fans without requiring account creation, with a flat 5% fee on transactions.

name: Gumroad
description: Platform for creators to sell digital products, subscriptions, and memberships directly to their audience.

name: Setupad
description: Analytics-driven monetization platform that helps publishers maximize ad revenue with header bidding technology and premium demand partners.

name: Google AdSense
description: Google's ad network that allows publishers to monetize their websites by displaying targeted ads to visitors.

name: Ezoic
description: AI-driven platform that optimizes ad placements and settings to maximize revenue for publishers with website testing and analytics.

name: Media.net
description: Contextual advertising network that provides high-quality ads from Yahoo! Bing Network with competitive CPMs for publishers.

name: AdPushup
description: Ad revenue optimization platform with AI-powered tools for layout testing, header bidding, and adblock recovery for publishers.

name: Mediavine
description: Full-service ad management for content creators and lifestyle publishers with premium ad partners and high RPMs.

name: Amazon Associates
description: Amazon's affiliate program that allows creators to earn commissions by promoting products from the world's largest online retailer.

name: ShareASale
description: Affiliate marketing network connecting publishers with thousands of merchants across various niches for commission-based partnerships.

name: CJ Affiliate
description: Large affiliate marketing network (formerly Commission Junction) with access to major brands and detailed performance analytics.

name: Awin
description: Global affiliate marketing network with over 15,000 brands, particularly strong for publishers with international audiences.

name: PartnerStack
description: Partnership platform specifically designed for SaaS and B2B companies with high commission rates for digital products.

name: ClickBank
description: Marketplace for digital product creators and affiliates with a focus on info products, courses, and software.

name: Rakuten Advertising
description: Global affiliate marketing network with strong relationships with luxury and high-end retail brands.

name: FlexOffers
description: Affiliate marketing network with over 12,000 advertisers and flexible payment options for publishers of all sizes.

name: Impact
description: Partnership management platform for automating and scaling affiliate, influencer, and strategic business partnerships.

name: Skimlinks
description: Automated affiliate marketing tool that converts normal links into affiliate links without manual effort from publishers.

name: LTK (formerly RewardStyle)
description: Influencer marketing and shopping platform focused on lifestyle, fashion, and home verticals with mobile app integration.
